name: Heatmap & Analytics – Howuku Web Optimization
author: Howuku

sections.description:
Free heatmap and analytics tool for your WordPress sites.

Howuku is an all-in-one behavior analytics platform created to help you understand your audience better. Designed especially for marketers and product managers, Howuku offers state-of-the-art analytics tools to understand and visualize user behavior with heatmap and how it impacts your product.

With Howuku, you can track dynamic heatmap, conversion funnels and get instant feedback from your customers to help your product grow.

Additionally, the heatmap and recording can help you eliminate guesswork and show you what your visitors do exactly and why they drop-off from your website.

Get started for free

What is Heatmap?

A website heatmap is a visual representation that shows you what elements on your website are getting the most interaction (hot) and those that are getting the least (cold).

You get a comprehensive understanding of what is holding visitors’ attention, what needs to be improved, and what needs to be removed.

Basically, a heatmap help you see an aggregated view of your user behaviors’ hotspot.

How can heatmap helps you improve website conversions?

  1. Make sure all your important Call-to-actions is above the average-fold of your scroll map
  2. Identify if your visitors are confused by non-clickable elements and turn those into links
  3. Find out what your visitors are looking for and reposition your element to improve engagement rate
  4. Make sure visitors seeing critical website elements like eBooks, guides, and solution briefs?

KEY FEATURES OF HEATMAP

  • Click heatmap to learn where do visitor click the most
  • Scroll heatmap to find out how far down do visitors scrolled
  • Segment heatmap with segmented user data such as Source, Referrer, Day of Week and etc
  • Sharable external heatmap link to your product and marketing team
  • Export PDF report of your heatmap

OTHER OPTIMIZATION FEATURES

  • Heatmap: click map, scroll map, and user segmented hotspot
  • Visitor Recording: CCTV for your website
  • Realtime Analytics and Conversion Funnel
  • Create unlimited no. of websites, recordings and heatmap
  • Free feedback widget tool and pop-up survey
  • On-site A/B testing no coding needed
  • Filtering and segmentation
  • Mobile, tablet, and PC recordings

Learn more about all optimization features here!

Resources

Pricing: Affordable Plans
Heatmap: Dynamic Heatmap
Register: GET STARTED FOR FREE

sections.installation:
1. Install Howuku plugin in WordPress and activate it.
  2. Create a new account or use existing one to login to Howuku.
  3. Find your Howuku code snippet inside Howuku dashboard
  4. Paste it into your Howuku plugin on WordPress and save it
  5. Now Howuku is already installed on your website. You can go to Howuku dashboard to view all your website data from there.
sections.faq:
Do I need a Howuku account?

Yes, a Howuku account is needed. You can sign up for a free account at howuku.com.

Do you offer free plan on Howuku?

Yes, we do have a forever free plan that comes with 5,000 free monthly pageviews with 200 recording/heatmap limits. You can sign up for a free account here. create a free account.

Do I need a different script for Heatmap?

No, you only need to install it once through the Howuku code snippet and you will have access into all our other products.

How long can I see the heatmap and analytics data after installing the plugin?

Your analytics & heatmap data is processed in real-time and it should show up in heatmap report within a couple of minutes.

Is there a limit on recording & heatmap storage?

No, we don’t have a limits on how many recordings & heatmap can your site record per month, however your site will stop recording when the tracked pageviews limit was reached.

Do I need to pay a monthly subscription to use it?

Not at all, Howuku have a free forever plan that you can use it to optimize your website as long as you like.
